entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
